full_output.summary: To secure a position as a Business Analytics and Marketing professional where I can utilize my blend of analytical acumen and marketing insights to drive data-informed decisions and foster strategic growth initiatives. Eager to leverage my academic background in business analytics and marketing to contribute effectively to a dynamic team, while gaining hands-on experience and further developing my skill set in the field.

experiences.description: Responsible for sourcing, screening, and engaging potential candidates via telephone, scheduling interviews, providing information, maintaining records, following up with candidates, networking, collaborating with team members, and staying updated on industry trends.

Responsible for providing guidance, direction, and support to team members, assigning tasks, managing performance, resolving conflicts, facilitating communication, making decisions, managing resources, fostering team development, motivating team members, and contributing to strategic planning and risk management.

skills: Proficient in data analysis tools (Excel, R, Python, SQL)
Familiarity with market research techniques and tools
Ability to work effectively in a team and independently
full_output.name: Vikas Sharma
